main event: The observer sighted a bluish light in the NE for about one second. The observer said that the object was blended with the sky.
interesting points: The object was moving in a straight line.
The object was observed for a short duration of about 5 seconds.
The sighting was classified as a 'Probable Astro (Phenomena)'.
The witness did not report any physical evidence or impact on the environment.
The witness had not made any prior reports of similar phenomena.
